ygData.subject: Re: EQ expansion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The plain (sic) of fear is already there.  You just have to be 46th level to get to it.  And they re adding two continents, not one.  And a number of
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 10 Sep 1999, Michael Ott wrote:

> Does anyone know what will be added to the expansion. I have heard different
> stories from different people. I have heard that Velious would be the new
> continent added as well as the plain of fear I have also heard of a
> different continent being added. If anyone knows I would love to hear more.

The plain (sic) of fear is already there. You just have to be 46th
level to get to it. And they're adding two continents, not one. And a
number of races. If you go to eq.stratics.com and check out the various
news articles you might find more solid information.
